posts.raw_content:
If the powers that be fail to acknowledge these positions and give ground in their attempt to shift the overton window to the furthest left as possible, the longer this goes on, the greater the backlash will be.

The sustem is being used to steal the birthright of American citizens away from them. The institutions have become corrupted.

This is only going to cause resentment and a backlash against the system itself. How long until "then one day, for no reason at all" comes along?

Maybe that was the point but it's highly likely the manipulators won't like what they've asked for in the end.
